objectives.title: Traffic
objectives.description: Aims to drive more visitors and increase page views.

objectives.title: Sales
objectives.description: Converts potential customers into buyers by encouraging purchase.

objectives.title: Awareness
objectives.description: Focuses on increasing brand recognition and visibility.
objectives.suitable_for_description: New businesses, brands launching new products.

objectives.title: Engagement
objectives.description: Encourages your audience to interact and connect with your brand.
objectives.suitable_for_description: Influencers and community builders looking for followers of the same interest.
